comments:
description:
outline view for a library can't be initiated

steps to reproduce:
1. new a report library
2. go to outline view 

actual result:
Out;ine view can't be created and NullPointerException thrown out.

exception stack trace:
java.lang.NullPointerException
at
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.model.views.outline.ReportElementModel.getElementHandle(ReportElementModel.java:69)
at
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.ProviderFactory.createProvider(ProviderFactory.java:114)
at
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.ViewsTreeProvider.getText(ViewsTreeProvider.java:138)
supplement the theme compatible support and the library can be opened properly.
